channel.title: [QUESTION] How to retrieve lost data due to reformatting?
channel.description:
Does anyone know of any programs or ways how to retrieve lost data, which are due to reformatting of the computer?
I just recently (today) got a virus, even though I have all kinds of up-to-date protection. This virus didn't take long from when I obtained it, until my computer couldn't even be rebooted. So, the only choice I had to do was to reformat my computer, and therefore lose around 14 days of programming on my recent project. I did back it up around 14 days ago (30/12-2007), so I didn't lose it all, but still very much (about half of what I had done).
So, my question is, as stated earlier... Do you know about any program or ways how to retrieve lost data, on a reformatted HDD?
EDIT: I might have fixed it... I used File Scavenger to retrieve them, and as far as I know, they are all retrieved. The only thing I need to redo is to re-save them once again, as they cannot be compiled (it seems). I can look at them, the text is all fine, but still something won't let them be compiled (some encryption or something).

item.title: [QUESTION] How to retrieve lost data due to reformatting?
item.dc:creator: @killer_jcd killer jcd
item.description:
@killer_jcd wrote:

there is a way. I would need to ask my parents they have done this for me a few times. But ill get right back to you, there is a way. But I also believe that you have needed to reformat it a specific way to save all saved data. so yea. ill get right back to you and before I do try, www.google.com

Read full topic
item.source: [QUESTION] How to retrieve lost data due to reformatting?

item.title: [QUESTION] How to retrieve lost data due to reformatting?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Does anyone know of any programs or ways how to retrieve lost data, which are due to reformatting of the computer?

I just recently (today) got a virus, even though I have all kinds of up-to-date protection. This virus didn’t take long from when I obtained it, until my computer couldn’t even be rebooted. So, the only choice I had to do was to reformat my computer, and therefore lose around 14 days of programming on my recent project. I did back it up around 14 days ago (30/12-2007), so I didn’t lose it all, but still very much (about half of what I had done).

So, my question is, as stated earlier… Do you know about any program or ways how to retrieve lost data, on a reformatted HDD?

EDIT:
I might have fixed it… I used File Scavenger to retrieve them, and as far as I know, they are all retrieved. The only thing I need to redo is to re-save them once again, as they cannot be compiled (it seems). I can look at them, the text is all fine, but still something won’t let them be compiled (some encryption or something).
